title: 464: The Final Haunting w/ Roz Hernandez!
itunes:title: 464: The Final Haunting w/ Roz Hernandez!
description:
The Broads sit down for their final ghostly Halloween episode with Roz Hernandez! They catch up and hear about her latest spooky happenings, creepy home updates, share a few stories about haunted locations, and do some haunted doll shopping together! The #broadsquad loves you forever, Roz! Make sure to follow Roz and tune into her podcast!

ROZ HERNANDEZ:

***Follow Roz on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rozhernandez/

***Listen to “Ghosted” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/ghosted-by-roz-hernandez/id1450864418

***Patreon here: https://www.patreon.com/Rozdrezfalez

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***PRETTY LITTER: Go to PRETTYLITTER.COM/CHATTY to save 20% off on your FIRST order!

***MATCH DATING APP: Download the Match app today!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
